segments.text: You keep bowling spares but no strike .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know why , but I think there's something wrong with my hands . I couldn't seem to be able to control it on the first ball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think it was the problem with your hands , you did several excellent spares . You have no problem with your hands .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then why couldn't I get strike on the first ball ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The problem is you are too nervous . You want to have a strike so much , so you deliver the ball too hard . And when it comes to the I second roll , there's no pressure . That's why you could bowl all those spares .
segments.speaker: S1
